oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Slide Collection - Farmers' Market
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Replacing the Market on the Public Square, the Farmers' Market opened in the late fall of 1954. It was located between Jefferson and Jackson Streets and Sixth and Eighth Avenues North. 35 mm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farmer's Market
Architecture; Popular culture; Shopping
Nashville (Tenn.); Public Square; Jefferson Street; Eighth Avenue North; Jackson Street; Sixth Avenue North
